page.title: 05Law and order in Chudleigh
page.content: The community policeman is a member of a team of 6 full-time police, one Inspector and a sergeant who cover the area between Chudleigh and Mortonhamp- stead and Bovey Tracey. There is one car on the road at any time and a car at Mortonhampstead. There is not much crime in this "sleeply little hollow" which used to be busy before the motorway opened ten years ago, much to the relief of the locals. Police work involves investigation of accidents, thefts from vehicles, especially in the summertime on Dartmoor, and the odd burglary of outlying houses. There was a murder in Chudleigh Knighton recently. "There is the usual cross section of crime but it is not on the scale of the cities."
